content: get ready for a hauntingly cute make the **wheat stitch™ ghost** crochet pattern is an easy and fun halloween project perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike this little ghost is worked in my signature *** wheat stitch 1 *** from the top down in the round creating a smooth seamless body **two finishing options ** - make a bottomless ghost to place over led lights fairy lights or a jar of treats for a glowing halloween decoration - or stuff and seal it to create a soft huggable ghost plushie for spooky season cuddles **bonus accessories included ** - a wickedly stylish witch hat worked from the top down - a plump mini pumpkin crocheted in row then stitched into shape whether you re adding to your halloween amigurumi collection or making a one-of-a-kind handmade gift this wheat stitch ghost will bring a touch of spooky-sweet magic to your crochet hook a video tutorial is included with the pattern 2 crochet hook g 4 0mm -
